headline: Monolithic Power targets revenue growth exceeding market by 10%-15% in 2025-2027
summary: In investor day slides laying out the company’s 2025-2027 financial goals, Monolithic Power (MPWR) notes its target revenue growth exceeding the market by 10%-15%, gross margin of 55%-60%, operating expenditure of 80%-90% of annual revenue revenue growth and cash returned to shareholders of 40%-50% of free cash flow. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news. Try Now>> See Insiders’ Hot Stocks on TipRanks >> Read More on MPWR: Monolithic

headline: Kessler Topaz Meltzer & Check, LLP Announces Securities Fraud Class Action Lawsuit Filed Against Monolithic Power Systems, Inc.
